name: Agldemo
tagline: Android OpenGL ES demos (Only several implements of NeHe lessons now. Some other demos will be added)
body:
agldemo
=======

agldemo is a bunch of OpenGL ES demos on Android.

Only several implements of NeHe lessons now, some other demos will be added.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
